input_text:
NEW EMPLOYEE ONBOARDING
Human Resources Department

Monday, February 3, 2025
9:00 AM - 3:00 PM EST

Location: Corporate Headquarters, Training Center A
500 Main Street, New York, NY 10001
Virtual: https://meet.company.com/onboarding-feb (Code: 456-789-012)

Schedule:
9:00-9:45 Welcome & Company Overview (Jennifer White, HR Director)
9:45-10:45 HR Policies and Benefits (Jennifer White)
10:45-11:00 Break
11:00-12:30 IT Systems Setup (David Lee, IT Manager)
12:30-1:30 Team Lunch
1:30-2:30 Department Introductions
2:30-3:00 Q&A and Next Steps (Jennifer White)

Before you arrive:
✓ Complete pre-onboarding paperwork
✓ Bring government-issued ID for badge

Materials:
- Employee Handbook: https://intranet.company.com/handbook.pdf
- System Access Form: https://intranet.company.com/access-form.pdf

Questions? hr@company.com

expected_json.special_instructions: Complete pre-onboarding paperwork before the session. Bring government-issued ID for badge.
